verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Jesus priceless treasure
Source of purest pleasure
Truest friend to me
Long my heart hath panted
'Til it well-nigh fainted
Thirsting after Thee
Thine I am O spotless lamb
I will suffer nought to hide Thee
Ask for naught beside Thee

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
In Thy strength I rest me
Foes who would molest me
Cannot reach me here
Though the earth be shaking
Every heart be quaking
God dispels our fear
Sin and hell in conflict fell
With their heaviest storms assail us
Jesus will not fail us

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Banished is our sadness
For the Lord of gladness
Jesus enters in
Those who love the Father
Though the storms may gather
Still have peace within
Yea whate'er we here must bear
Still in Thee lies purest pleasure
Jesus priceless treasure
